Package org.svvrl.goal.core.layout

Class AbstractGALayout<C extends Chromosome>

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.AbstractGALayout<C>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of chromosomes
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
TimGALayout.TimGAImpl
public abstract class AbstractGALayout<C extends Chromosome>
extends AbstractAlgorithm
This class provides an implement of a layout algorithm based on the genetic algorithm.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • select

      protected java.util.List<C> select​(java.util.List<C> chroms)
      Selects the next generation from a specified set of chromosomes. The input chromosomes are sorted ascendantly by their fitness.
      Parameters:
      chroms - a list of chromosomes sorted ascendantly by their fitness
      Returns:
      the selected chromosomes to be the next generation

    • selectByLinearNormalization

      protected java.util.List<C> selectByLinearNormalization​(java.util.List<C> chroms)
      Selects the next generation from a specified set of chromosomes with linear normalization. The input chromosomes are sorted ascendantly by their fitness.
      Parameters:
      chroms - a list of chromosomes sorted ascendantly by their fitness
      Returns:
      the selected chromosomes to be the next generation
